title: The Villainous Lady Aims to Overthrow the Heroine - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Academy   Age Progression   Arranged Marriage   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Engagement   Female Protagonist   Friendship   Hard-Working Protagonist   Honest Protagonist   Hot-blooded Protagonist   Kind Love Interests   Lack of Common Sense   Love Triangles   Nobles   Otome Game   Reincarnated in a Game World   Short Story   Stubborn Protagonist   Villainess Noble Girls   Wealthy Characters
author: Aska
description:
This series is split into two works: a short story and a novella.
Belfreya Alunst was once a typical villainous lady. However, for some reason, she has become one of those hot-blooded protagonists that usually show up in weekly magazines, struggling to defeat their strongest rival.>
